Text: Wow. So....you took a fairly decent movie on a crappy plotline, and edited out the plot. Considering JLM (Dade Murphy) is in almost EVERY scene, you took a full feature film and did what with it? Chopped it up and extended a 2 second breast scene. Way to go age 13!

so what yor saying is that this edit actually is 4 minutes in total? are you nuts? is your mum your sister?

Can people like you just go to sleep again and never wake up...please...
For real you're as wack as it gets, at the time this movie was ok. Why go through the trouble of fucking it up more some tard you are. Waste of time lahoooooser.
